fields.name: Parnassus - L5
fields.description:
Many people have visited the ski center of Kelaria in Parnassos and have been left in awe by the view. 

On Sunday, 22/01, we will try to get to the mountaintop nearby and see the wonderful view that it provides.


Mountain hiking equipment and knowledge of how to use it is mandatory. 

The trip is a level 5/5 on the scale of difficulty.

fields.name: Lake Doxa - Mount Cyllene - L2
fields.description:
Lake Doxa is an artificial lake created in the village of Archaia Feneos, in Western Corinthia, on the Peloponnesian Peninsula. According to the ancient Greek historian Herodotus, the area was considered part of the Arcadia region, and its name name comes from the ancient city of Pheneus. [referrence]


The trip lasts 3 days and we will hike in both Lake Doxa and Mount Cyllene.

The difficulty level is level 2/5 - Suitable for beginners, yet advanced hikers are sure to also love the beauty of the vistas there. 

No equipment needed. 

The price includes transportation and hotel.

fields.name: Easter in Marrakech - L1
fields.description:
This Easter we go to Morocco! 


We will visit vast lakes, Berber villages and the tallest mountain in North Africa, the Jebel Toubkal! (4167m.)

The trip will be a Level 1 in difficulty scaling, as it is mostly a visiting trip.

fields.name: Climb Mt. Dirfys - L4
fields.description:
Mt. Dirfys is the tallest mountain on the island of Evia. 


We will have a weekend of climbing it and the night of Saturday we will sleep at one of the cabins located there. 

As this is a mountain climb, it can get challenging and cold. Make sure you pack all the necessary equipment!

fields.name: Lofoten Islands - L3
fields.description:
This summer we are visiting the Lofoten islands in Norway! 


"Located far north of the Arctic Circle, Lofoten is a place where mother nature reminds you who's in charge. The granite mountains hide many surprises.

From idyllic fishing villages to remarkable beaches that seem so out of place in Arctic Norway, the Norwegian islands of Lofoten have it all." [source]


Make sure you register in advance!

fields.name: Christmas at Lapland
fields.description:
This Christmas we are going to Lapland, Finland! 

Let's have Christmas under the Aurora Borealis!

fields.comment: Great trip, do not recommend for beginners!
I enjoyed this trip so much!

fields.description: I want to hike somewhere in the Carpathian mountains!
I want a trip to the Alps
A hike to Olympus would be great!
